member.name: M:CSharpOsu.OsuClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: API Key

member.name: M:CSharpOsu.OsuClient.GetUrl(System.String)
member.param: Url of the JSON.

member.name: M:CSharpOsu.OsuClient.GetBeatmap(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{CSharpOsu.Enum.mode},System.Nullable{CSharpOsu.Enum.conv},System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.param: Specify a beatmapset or beatmap id.
If is beatmapset or not(default true)
Return all beatmaps ranked since this date. Must be a MySQL date.
Specify a user or a username to return metadata from.
Mode (0 = osu!, 1 = Taiko, 2 = CtB, 3 = osu!mania). Optional, maps of all modes are returned by default.

Specify whether converted beatmaps are included (0 = not included, 1 = included). Only has an effect if m is chosen and not 0. Converted maps show their converted difficulty rating. Optional, default is 0.

The beatmap hash. It can be used, for instance, if you're trying to get what beatmap has a replay played in, as .osr replays only provide beatmap hashes (example of hash: a5b99395a42bd55bc5eb1d2411cbdf8b). Optional, by default all beatmaps are returned independently from the hash.
Amount of results. Optional, default and maximum are 500.

member.name: M:CSharpOsu.OsuClient.GetUser(System.String,System.Nullable{CSharpOsu.Enum.mode},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.param: Specify a user id or a username to return metadata from (required).
Mode (0 = osu!, 1 = Taiko, 2 = CtB, 3 = osu!mania). Optional, maps of all modes are returned by default.
Max number of days between now and last event date. Range of 1-31. Optional, default value is 1.

member.name: M:CSharpOsu.OsuClient.GetScore(System.Int32,System.String,System.Nullable{CSharpOsu.Enum.mode},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Get informations about scores from a beatmap.
member.param: Specify a beatmap_id to return score information from.
Specify a user_id or a username to return score information for.
Mode (0 = osu!, 1 = Taiko, 2 = CtB, 3 = osu!mania). Optional, default value is 0.
Specify a mod or mod combination (See https://github.com/ppy/osu-api/wiki#mods )
Amount of results from the top (range between 1 and 100 - defaults to 50).

member.name: M:CSharpOsu.OsuClient.GetUserBest(System.String,System.Nullable{CSharpOsu.Enum.mode},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Get informations about a user best scores.
member.param: Specify a user_id or a username to return score information for.
Mode (0 = osu!, 1 = Taiko, 2 = CtB, 3 = osu!mania). Optional, default value is 0.
Amount of results from the top (range between 1 and 100 - defaults to 50).

member.name: M:CSharpOsu.OsuClient.GetUserRecent(System.String,System.Nullable{CSharpOsu.Enum.mode},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Get informations about a user recent scores.
member.param: Specify a user_id or a username to return score information for.
Mode (0 = osu!, 1 = Taiko, 2 = CtB, 3 = osu!mania). Optional, default value is 0.
Amount of results from the top (range between 1 and 100 - defaults to 50).

member.summary: Get informations about a multiplayer lobby.
member.param: Match id to get information from.

member.name: M:CSharpOsu.OsuClient.GetReplay(CSharpOsu.Enum.mode,System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: The mode the score was played in.
The beatmap ID (not beatmap set ID!) in which the replay was played.
The user that has played the beatmap.

member.name: M:CSharpOsu.OsuClient.GetReplay(CSharpOsu.Enum.mode,System.Int32,System.String,CSharpOsu.Enum.type,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get all the bytes to create a .osr file.
member.param: The mode the score was played in.
The beatmap ID (not beatmap set ID!) in which the replay was played.
The user that has played the beatmap.
A way to show the compliler that this is a different function.
Specify a mod or mod combination (See https://github.com/ppy/osu-api/wiki#mods )
There can be mroe than 1 replay that contains those arguments , an array is needed.
